sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A congratulatory poem, to the high and mighty Czar of Muscovy, on his arrival in England on Tuesday the 11th. of this instant January, 1697/8.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed and sold by J. Bradford in Little Britain, London, : 1698.
Verse: "Welcome, great monarch, to our happy shore". Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

Verse: "Welcome, great monarch, to our happy shore". Reproduction of original in the British Library.
